casebody.data:
ESTATE OF Ezra Gerald SMITH, By and Through the Administratrix of His Estate, Renee RICHARDSON, et al., petitioners,
v.
UNITED STATES. No. 12-1111. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013.

Case below, 509 Fed.Appx. 436.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.
